onCreateCommand: curl -LO https://github.com/stedolan/jq/releases/download/jq-1.6/jq-linux64 && chmod +x jq-linux64 && mv jq-linux64 /usr/local/bin/jq && curl -LO https://github.com/cli/cli/releases/download/v2.4.0/gh_2.4.0_linux_amd64.tar.gz && tar -xzf gh_2.4.0_linux_amd64.tar.gz && mv gh_2.4.0_linux_amd64/bin/gh /usr/local/bin/ && rm -rf gh_2.4.0_linux_amd64 gh_2.4.0_linux_amd64.tar.gz && echo "$GITHUB_TOKEN" | gh auth login --with-token && gh codespace ports visibility 6200:public -c fictional-space-broccoli-pjw5r6gx96652r99x
